src:
Triplete Termuda, Rodrygo Terpaut 188 Hari dari Raul Gonzalez
07 Nov 2019, 09:49 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bomber muda Real Madrid, Rodrygo, tidak akan melupakan pertandingan melawan Galatasaray. Sebab, dia mampu mencetak tiga gol alias hattrick. Namun, dia bukan pencetak hattrick termuda di Liga Champions untuk Real Madrid.
Real Madrid berjumpa Galatasaray pada pekan ke-4 Grup A Liga Champions 2019/2020, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Bermain di Bernabeu, Real Madrid menang mudah. Madrid menang enam gol tanpa balas.
Real Madrid sudah unggul cepat di babak pertama. Belum genap 15 menit laga berjalan, Los Blancos sudah unggul 3-0. Rodrygo mencetak dua gol dan Sergio Ramos mencetak gol dari titik putih. Karim Benzema membuat babak pertama berakhir 4-0 lewat golnya di menit 45.
Pada babak kedua, Madrid menambah dua gol. Benzema mencetak gol pada menit 81. Kemudian, Rodrygo menutup malam sempurna di Bernabeu dengan golnya di menit 90. Rodrygo mencetak hattrick pertamanya untuk Real Madrid.
text:
Youngest Triplete, Rodrygo Adrift 188 Days from Raul Gonzalez
Nov 7, 2019, 09:49 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid's young bomber, Rodrygo, will not forget the match against Galatasaray. Because, he was able to score three goals aka hat trick. However, he is not the youngest printer in the Champions League for Real Madrid.
Real Madrid met Galatasaray in the fourth week of Group A Champions League 2019/2020, Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. Playing at the Bernabeu, Real Madrid won easily. Madrid won six goals without reply.
Real Madrid were ahead in the first round. Not even 15 minutes of the game running, Los Blancos was winning 3-0. Rodrygo scored twice and Sergio Ramos scored from the spot. Karim Benzema made the first half ended 4-0 through his goal in minute 45.
In the second half, Madrid added two goals. Benzema scored in the 81st minute. Then, Rodrygo closed the perfect night at the Bernabeu with his goal in the 90th minute. Rodrygo scored his first hat trick for Real Madrid.
